categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: The Punworcca 116-class interstellar sloop, also known as the Geonosian solar sailer or simply the solar sailer, was a solar sailer developed by Huppla Pasa Tisc Shipwrights Collective. Dooku, a Sith Lord, Count of Serenno, and leader of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, was a notable owner of a solar sailer.
